attributes.action: Declaring a day for prayer in UK (Coronavirus)
attributes.additional_details:
The creator who made human race. When a equipment broken it is fixed by the manufacturer.  God created human race and only He has solution. He is the one capable to save us in this situation 

So let us take time to kneel before our God Almighty. 

As 2 Chronicles:7:14 says, “ if My people who are called by My name will humble themselves, and pray and seek My face, and turn from their wicked ways, then I will hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin and heal their land“.
attributes.background:
This coronavirus has taken over our lives. A helpless situation for all. Everything we hold dear is slipping away. The dark clouds of fear and uncertainty enveloping us. The human race vanishing like a vapour. 
All measures or strategy fruitless. Mankind’s desperation. 
Let us look on our creator.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
